title: Rectangle Area Calculator: Length, Width, Perimeter & Diagonal | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Area: \( A = L \times W \) Perimeter: \( P = 2(L + W) \) Diagonal: \( d = \sqrt{L^2 + W^2} \) From perimeter + one side: \( W = \frac{P}{2} - L \) From diagonal + one side: \( W = \sqrt{d^2 - L^2} \)
